title: 2 losses in promos for one game
body: So I just got into my promos and was given a free win, but after playing my first game and losing I was given 2 losses. I also noticed on lolking that it showed my one loss game twice. Is there any reason for this or is it a bug?

replies.body: Hmmmmm I'm not entirely sure what's going on with lolking (it's not actually run by Riot Games) or why that match was recorded twice on their website, but rest assured that this match was only counted once in our database. I've got your account pulled up now, and I do only see one Draven match with those stats and items, which matches up with your client match history.
Well why do I have 2 losses in that series?

You don't. He just said that.
He's saying the site is bugged and you only have one loss.
no in my ranked promo series I got 2 losses from that game

6 months later and this happens to me.... and the next game someone bans my intended champion and lock zed top. And then riot gives me a punishment for dodging and telling me that my league has been unactive, placing me back at 90 lp . FeelsBadMan {{item:3070}}
